text: Insurgent is a 2012 dystopian novel by Veronica Roth. The book is a sequel to the novel Divergent and is followed by the final book in the trilogy, Allegiant. It was number four on the New York Times Best Seller List for Young Adult fiction. Insurgent is set after Divergent, and continues the story of Beatrice Prior. ==References== Category:2012 books Category:Books by Veronica Roth
title: Insurgent (novel)
